2020-10-10-Polymorphic recursion

Type inference for polymorphic recursion is undecidable, 这意味着即使一个 function 是 well-typed，编译器也无法推导出其类型

For example:

data Nested a = Cons a (Nested [a]) | Epsilon length' Epsilon = 0 length' (Cons _ rest) = 1 + length' rest

会产生一个 type error，因为 length 被应用到了两个不同的类型上 Nested a and Nested [a] .

The solution is to assert that the type is indeed Nested a -> Int .

length' :: Nested a -> Int length' Epsilon = 0 length' (Cons _ rest) = 1 + length' rest https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40247339/polymorphic-recursion-syntax-and-uses
